comments.body: Surely this belongs in BeforeEach(), not AfterEach()?

Sorry did not get you. Do you mean move SkipUnlessFederated to BeforeEach?
We put that line in BeforeEach, AfterEach and It() - all 3.

ideally use a unique namespace name (as generated by the framework), so that running the test multiple times against the same cluster (e.g. as the soak tests do), cannot cause contamination between runs.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +94,98 @@
			// Creating a service in a non-existing namespace should fail.
			svcNamespace := "federation-admission-test-ns"
			svcName := "myns"
			clientset := f.FederationClientset_1_4

comments.body: It is probably worth defining this as a const, but it is fine for now.
